intro: Habenaria longirostris, commonly known as the long-beaked orchid, is a terrestrial orchid native to parts of Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its slender, erect stem and lance-shaped leaves. The plant produces a single, elongated spike bearing several pale yellow to greenish-white flowers. Its flowers have a distinctive long, slender spur that extends from the base of the lip. This orchid thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories.
